name: Robot And Frank
description:
ROBOT AND FRANK is a game made for Extra Credit Game Jam #6. It’s loosely based on the beautiful science fiction movie of the same name.

You’re playing a cute robot that works in a retirement home. There you take care of all the elderly people. One day an old man asks you for help. So, as your program suggests, you help him. He wants to break out, but since his eyes are quite bad, you have to help him and guide him towards the exit. The problem is: you can’t talk. Your only way to communicate is by making “beep”-sounds.

Have fun with this short stealth puzzler.

 

CONTROLLS:

Move: WASD / Arrow-keys

Beep: Space-key
